#include <stdio.h>
#include <stdlib.h>

int cmpfunc(const void* x , const void* y)
{
    return *(int *)x - *(int *)y;
}

int main()
{
    int *arr;
    int t,n,i;
    //freopen("median.txt","r",stdin);
    scanf("%d",&t);
    while(t--)
    {
        scanf("%d",&n);

        arr = (int *)calloc(n, sizeof(int));

        for(i=0;i<n;i++)
            scanf("%d",&arr[i]);
        if(n%2 == 0)
        {
            printf("-1\n");
            continue;
        }


        qsort(arr, n, sizeof(int), cmpfunc);

//        for(i=0;i<n;i++)
//            printf("%d",arr[i]);

//        printf("\n");

        printf("%d\n",arr[n/2]);
        free(arr);
    }
    return 0;
}
